Title: create a new psql database
Description:
open 'psql' and type the command:
CREATE DATABASE exercisedb;

Title: import the tables - restore the .tar file
Description:
from the terminal command line (not the psql terminal) type:
$ pg_restore -d exercisedb db.tar

Title: display all customers
Description: Write an sql query to find and display (Retrieve)  all the customers. Review the output table column headings, those are your data field names.

Title: display first 5 customers
Description: Write a sql query to retrieve the first 5 orders.

display all customers by their names in reverse alphabetical order

Description: Inspect the boot names. hint: use alphabetical greater or less than matchers

Title: display all orders
Description: Write an sql query to retrieve all the orders. Tip: To get out of a long list, hit esc then hit q

Description: Write a sql query to retrieve the first 5 orders.

Description: display the 5 orders with the highest id numbers.
